thread.title: Doom 3: Phobos is looking for mappers and animators

post.author: geX
post.body:
Team Future is looking for Mappers and Animators who can help us finish an unofficial expansion pack for doom 3.

If you want to work with an experienced mod team, Team Future is where you want to be. Phobos is going to be an huge expansion with new character, monsters and story. Don't let this chance of opportunity go!

We are looking for dedicated team members who wants to dig deep with the current team, and get this mod out the door.

We are looking mappers who are good at the following:
- Tech/base
- Organic/hell
- Outdoor(Mars and Phobos)

As an animator you will be animating characters for cutscenes and the like.

So come to our forum at http://www.tfuture.org/phobos and show us what you can do!
